oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A first report of the complexes of 5,11,17,23-tetra-tert-butyl-25,27-diethoxycarboxymethoxy-26,28-dihydroxycalix[4]arene with Mn(II), Fe(III), Co(II), Ni(II), Cu(II) and Zn(II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: AMJAD ALI
SALUNKE-GAWALI, SUNITA
RAO, CHEBROLU P
LINARES, JORGE
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: spectra
temperature
molecules
metal ions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Totally six dinuclear complexes of Mn(II), Fe(III), Co(II), Ni(II), Cu(II) and Zn(II) of calix[4]arene derivatized with two pendants possessing terminal –COOH functions at two of its alternate phenolic –OH groups were synthesized for the first time and were well characterized.
